notes.text:
This update for bluez fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-3588: Fixed a missing bounds checks inside cli_feat_read_cb() function in src/gatt-database.c (bsc#1187165)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The cli_feat_read_cb() function in src/gatt-database.c does not perform bounds checks on the 'offset' variable before using it as an index into an array for reading.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
